message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_FV_MUST_SPECIFY_UNITSAUTHORIZED
message.locale: Units Authorized must be specified.
Units Authorised must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_FV_UNITSAUTHORIZED_MUST_BE_GREATERTHAN_ZERO
message.locale: Units Authorized must be greater than zero.
Units Authorised must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_FV_MAX_UNITS_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Maximum Units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XFV_MAX_UNITS_EMPTY_MAX_UNIT_FREQUENCY_OPTION_SELECTED
message.locale: The Maximum Units must be entered if Maximum Units Frequency is selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XFV_MAX_UNIT_FREQUENCY_OPTION_EMPTY_MAX_UINT
message.locale: Maximum Units Frequency Option must be selected if Maximum Units is entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_SA_TODATE_EARLIER_OR_EQUAL_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ENDDATE
message.locale: The creation date must be earlier than or equal to the case participant End Date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XFV_UINTAMOUNT_MUST_BE_ENTER_IF_UINTAMOUNT_FIXED
message.locale: The Unit Amount must be entered if the Unit Amount Fixed is set to "Yes".

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_PROVIDER_MUST_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: The Provider, %1s, is not 'Approved', the service authorization line item cannot be created.
The Provider, %1s, is not 'Approved', the service authorisation line item cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_PROVIDER_SERVICE_MUST_BE_APPROVED

The Provider Service, %1s, is not 'Approved', the service authorisation line item cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_SERVICE_MUST_ACTIVE
message.locale: The service, %1s, is not 'Active', the service authorization line item cannot be created.
The service, %1s, is not 'Active', the service authorisation line item cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_FV_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Service must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_FV_FROM_DATE_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The From Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_SA_MUST_ACTIVE
message.locale: The service authorization is not 'Active', the service authorization line item cannot be added.
The service authorisation is not 'Active', the service authorisation line item cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_PROVIDET_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_PARLAR_SERVICE
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide the service, %2s. The service authorization line item cannot be created.
The provider, %1s, does not provide the service, %2s. The service authorisation line item cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_UNITSAUTHORIZED_INVALID
message.locale: Units Authorized entered is invalid.
Units Authorised entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MAXUNITS_INVALID
message.locale: Maximum Units entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_UNITSAMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: Unit Amount entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERAUTHORIZATION_XRV_DATE_MUST_BE_IN_SERVICEOF_DATERANGE
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not valid for the service authorization period specified, the service authorization line item cannot be created. The service offering period(s) are as follows:from %2d to %3d.

message.locale: The Case ParticipantRoleID must be enter.

message.locale: The Case participant Role does not exist.

message.locale: The client %1s is not eligible to receive the service %2s.
